entries.content: Starting welcome screen module refactoring session with Moti. Reviewing GridShineSweepController.js (377 lines) which has multiple mixed concerns: DOM creation, SVG mask generation, animation timing, cube highlighting, gradient creation, and color management. Will apply our proven ultra-modular orchestrator pattern used in 17+ previous refactorings to break this into focused micro-components.

Successfully refactored GridShineSweepController.js using ultra-modular orchestrator pattern. Reduced from 377 lines to 115 lines (70% reduction). Created 7 focused micro-components in grid-shine/ subdirectory. Zero breaking changes - maintained same public API. Build succeeded with no errors.
Enhancement request: Change single cube highlight per explosion to 3-7 random cubes, each with different random colors. This will make the RGB explosion effect more dramatic and visually appealing.

Enhanced welcome screen RGB explosion to highlight 3-7 random cubes per explosion instead of just 1. Each cube gets a different random color from the palette. Modified RandomCubeHighlighter to track arrays of cubes and select unique random cubes. Build successful.

Fixed gradient ID collision issue - each cube now gets unique gradient IDs (grad-rgb-transition-{cubeNumber} and grad-rgb-{cubeNumber}). Modified GradientBuilder to accept cubeNumber parameter and return unique gradient IDs. Updated RandomCubeHighlighter to pass cube numbers. Now each of the 3-7 cubes per explosion will have truly different colors.
Updated color palette to RGB-only with 9 shades: 3 shades each of red, green, and blue (light, medium, bright). Removed cyan, yellow, magenta, orange, and purple. Build successful.

Added Google Font 'Shadows Into Light' to welcome screen logo text. Added @import at top of welcome-screen.css and updated .logo-text font-family. Build successful. Font will give Sementix text a handwritten, playful appearance.

Reduced welcome screen spacing: changed .welcome-screen-content gap from 2rem to 0.5rem (fixed incorrect syntax), and reduced .welcome-start-button margin-top from 2rem to 0.5rem. Elements now have tighter, more compact layout.

Reduced gap between cube grid and "Sementix" text by adjusting SVG text y-position from 115 to 110 in WelcomeLogoSVG.js. Also removed invalid div wrapper around text element. Text now sits 5px closer to cubes (gap reduced from 10px to 5px).

Simplified welcome screen start button: changed from metallic silver gradient button to simple div with plus icon + "New conversation" text. Removed all background, borders, shadows. Just gray text with opacity hover effect (0.7 â†’ 1.0). Much cleaner, minimal design.
